无限画廊 unlimited art gallery

顔磊为艺术家张岳，做了一个“无限画廊”，并在这个画廊为其策划了一个展览
——《语录》。

Yan Lei makes up a fictitious artist with the name Zhang Yue and curates an exhibition called ‘Statements’
